title: QualiBooth
description: QualiBooth aids in meeting ADA, WCAG, and European accessibility standards. It provides real-time scans to identify barriers, detailed metrics dashboards, actionable guidance, and continuous monitoring. Enhance accessibility and inclusivity with QualiBooth. Able to detect up to 20% more issues than other Accessibility tools on the market. Speed up the development with fast recommendations. Prioritization based on actual user experience. Jira integration. Content and navigation issues detection.
